name: SpidyFacts
0:
”Alexa, open spidy facts”
”Alexa, start spidy facts”
”Alexa, ask spidy facts for a fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: spidy facts
des: Ask Alexa for an interesting list of facts about Spiders. When using the skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next fact. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
